# headers

**Instance Property**

A dictionary that contains the message’s header values.

## Declaration

```swift
var headers: [String : [String]]? { get }
```

## Discussion

If MailKit hasn’t downloaded the full message, this dictionary may only contain a subset of the message’s headers.

## Accessing Message Content

- **rawData**: The raw RFC 2822 header and body content of the message.

items.description: The raw RFC 2822 header and body content of the message.
